P

PhaseView - Class in view
Phase view contains not only the current Phase of the game but also has DominationView HumanPlayerView PlayerStatisticsView CardView
PhaseView(DominationView, GameController, CardView, HumanPlayerView) - Constructor for class view.PhaseView
Constructor that initializes the DominationView
phaseView - Static variable in class view.WindowManager
 
placeArmies(int) - Method in interface model.contract.ITerritory
 
placeArmies(IPlayer) - Method in class model.GameManager
this method helps players to move armies from a territory to another
placeArmies(int) - Method in class model.Territory
adds given number of armies to the current armies
placeArmy(int, ITerritory) - Method in interface model.contract.IPlayer
 
placeArmy(int, ITerritory) - Method in class model.Player
 
placeInitialArmies() - Method in class model.GameManager
This method automatically place initial armies into territories one by one according to the game rules in the start-up phase
play(boolean) - Method in class model.GameManager
This is the method that handles the game play It does the following steps until any player own entire map Step1: Selects a player in round robin Step2: Gives him reinforcement Step3: And the attack Step4: And then fortification Step5: Check if any player own entire map, if not continue
Player - Class in model
This is player POJO Object
Player(String, Color, IStrategy) - Constructor for class model.Player
Constructor that initializes the player details
Player(String) - Constructor for class model.Player
Constructor that initializes the player object with only his name
PlayerStatisticsView - Class in view
Gives a player statistic view Every player in the game has his Statistics View
PlayerStatisticsView() - Constructor for class view.PlayerStatisticsView
Constructor to initialize the basic UI elements
